metadata.title: Upgrade to v1.13
metadata.description: Learn how to upgrade your Packer installation to v1.13

outlineItems.title: Packer fmt command to format multiple HCL files

This enhancement allows you to provide a full script as an inline command, enabling dynamic scripts via tools like templatefile.`),mdx("p",null,`Added a wrapper around inline `,mdx("inlineCode",{parentName:"p"},`PowerShell`),` commands executed by the provisioner to catch errors and ensure the Packer build fails if any command results in an error.`),mdx("h2",{"id":"new-functions-support"},mdx("a",{parentName:"h2","className":"__permalink-h","href":"#new-functions-support","aria-label":"new functions support permalink"},`\xbb`),`New functions Support`),mdx("p",null,`As part of Packer 1.13, we have introduced more functions.`),mdx("ul",null,mdx("li",{parentName:"ul"},mdx("a",{parentName:"li","id":"sum","className":"__target-lic","aria-hidden":"true"}),mdx("a",{parentName:"li","href":"#sum","aria-label":"sum permalink","className":"__permalink-lic"},mdx("inlineCode",{parentName:"a"},`sum`)),`: takes a list or set of numbers and returns the sum of those numbers..`),mdx("li",{parentName:"ul"},mdx("a",{parentName:"li","id":"startswith","className":"__target-lic","aria-hidden":"true"}),mdx("a",{parentName:"li","href":"#startswith","aria-label":"startswith permalink","className":"__permalink-lic"},mdx("inlineCode",{parentName:"a"},`startswith`)),`: takes two values: a string to check and a prefix string. metadata.title: Packer by HashiCorp
metadata.description: Packer helps you create golden images for multiple platforms from a single source configuration.
